m:MaterialTitle.title: Introduction
m:MaterialTitle.description: Add a dropdown list to any button. Make sure to add the property activates to be able to initialize the dropdown plugin, it will use that as your id on your dropdown menu.

m:MaterialPanel.pre: <m:MaterialDropDown text="Selection" color="blue" waves="light" divider="true" activates="myDropDown"> <m:item><m:MaterialLink text="First" /></m:item> <m:item><m:MaterialLink text="Second" /></m:item> <m:item><m:MaterialLink text="Third" /></m:item> </m:MaterialDropDown>

m:MaterialTitle.title: Designing
m:MaterialTitle.description: You can add divider, waves and color attributes to your dropdown. On items you can use any Material Widgets like MaterialLink, MaterialButton etc. to add it inside the dropdown.

m:MaterialPanel.pre: <m:MaterialDropDown text="Selection" color="blue" waves="light" divider="true" activates="myDropDown2"> <m:item><m:MaterialLink text="Account" iconPosition="right" icon="mdi-action-account-circle"/></m:item> <m:item><m:MaterialLink text="Refresh" iconPosition="right" icon="mdi-action-autorenew"/></m:item> <m:item><m:MaterialLink text="Lock" iconPosition="right" icon="mdi-action-lock-outline"/></m:item> </m:MaterialDropDown>
